title: INNOWAY Key Account Manager and Innovation Specialists Services - NORIMS
objective:
Proposal to establishing services enhancing the innovation management capacity of SMEs in the Enterprise Europe Network - Business Cooperation Centre in Norway- INNOWAY Key Account Manager and Innovation Specialists Services - NORIMS

The specific objectives for the NORIMS project is to enhance the innovation management capacity of SMEs by reducing barriers to innovation and to ensure that more great ideas will reach the market. 

The two distinct types of services;
 a) Key account management under the SME Instrument in Horizon 2020 
and 
b) Services to enhance the innovation management capacity of SMEs 
will be offered as an integrated part of the general support services of the Enterprise Europe Network Business Cooperation Centre (BCC) in Norway in the period of 2015-2016*. 

The proposal consists of two work packages:

ï WP1 Implementation of Key Account Management (KAM) services for the beneficiaries of the SME instrument. 
ï WP2 Implementation of Innovation Management Capacity Building services.
